ABOUT ME


Filmmaker / Creative Digital Media Graduate


â€‹ Emanuele is an Italian filmmaker and Creative Digital Media graduate from Cork Institute of Technology (CIT).
My works have been selected for various film festivals such as First Cut Youth Film festival 2017/2018/2020 (Spotlight-Award), Indie Cork Film Festival 2018/2019, Story! Documentary Film festival, Passaggi D'autore and Premio Centottanta.
I have developed skills on video production, cinematography, sound design, animations, colourist and visual effects.
